mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id as "reviewId", r.user_id as "userId", r.review_id as "reviewId", p.product_name as "productName", p.product_price as "productPrice", p.product_description as "productDescription", r.rate as "rate", r.content as "content", ri.review_image_id as "reviewImageId", ri.review_image_name as "reviewImageName" FROM review r LEFT OUTER JOIN review_image ri ON r.review_id = ri.review_id INNER JOIN product p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY r.review_id
SELECT LAST_NUMBER-1 AS reviewId FROM user_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'REVIEW_SEQ'
SELECT LAST_NUMBER-1 AS reviewImageId FROM user_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'REVIEW_IMAGE_SEQ'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (review_id, rate, content, user_id, product_id) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rate}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{productId})

INSERT INTO REVIEW_IMAGE (review_image_id, review_image_name, review_image_size, review_image_type, review_image_data, review_id) VALUES (review_image_seq.nextval, #{reviewImageName}, #{reviewImageSize}, #{reviewImageType}, #{reviewImageData}, #{reviewId})
mapper.select: SELECT product_id as "productID", product_name as "productName", product_price as "productPrice", product_description as "productDescription" FROM product WHERE product_id = #{product_id}

SELECT review_image_id AS "reviewImageId", review_id AS "reviewId", review_image_name AS "reviewImageName", review_image_size AS "reviewImageSize", review_image_type AS "reviewImageType", review_image_data AS "reviewImageData" FROM review_image WHERE review_image_id=#{reviewImageId}

SELECT p.product_id as "productId", r.review_id as "reviewId", p.product_name as "productName", p.product_price as "productPrice", p.product_description as "productDescription", r.rate as "rate", r.content as "content", ri.review_image_id as "reviewImageId", ri.review_image_name as "reviewImageName", ri.review_image_size as "reviewImageSize", ri.review_image_type as "reviewImageType", ri.review_image_data as "reviewImageData" FROM review r LEFT OUTER JOIN review_image ri ON r.review_id=ri.review_id JOIN product p ON r.product_id=p.product_id WHERE r.review_id=#{reviewId}
mapper.update: UPDATE review_image SET review_image_name = #{reviewImageName}, review_image_type = #{reviewImageType}, review_image_size = #{reviewImageSize}, review_image_data = #{reviewImageData} WHERE review_id=#{reviewId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review_image WHERE EXISTS (SELECT review_id FROM review WHERE review.review_id=#{reviewId} AND review.review_id=review_image.review_id)
